subject: refactor: improve tab naming and section ordering
body:
Tab renames for clarity:
- "Work" → "Breakdown" (clearer - breaking down by type/tags/people)
- "Health" → "Risk" (accurate - it's about urgency/impact/security)

Risk tab reordering:
- Move Security-Related Commits to top (most actionable item first)
- Urgency/Impact sections follow

Work Hours Settings:
- Convert to collapsible section (collapsed by default)
- It's config, not content - shouldn't take visual priority
title: improve tab naming and section ordering
